Package org.carrot2.text.preprocessing.filter

LabelFilterProcessor filters.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompleteLabelFilter
    A filter that removes "incomplete" labels.
    ContextLabelFilter
    Defines the contract for label filtering components, which mark words and phrases that should not be considered as candidates for cluster labels
    GenitiveLabelFilter
    Removes labels that end in words in the Saxon Genitive form, for example Threatening the Country's.
    MinLengthLabelFilter
    Removes labels whose length in characters is smaller than the provided value.
    NumericLabelFilter
    Removes labels that start with a numeric token.
    QueryLabelFilter
    Removes labels that consist only of query words.
    SingleLabelFilterBase
    A base for ContextLabelFilter implementations that handle each label independently.
    StopLabelFilter
    Removes labels that are declared as stop labels in the stoplabels.<lang> files (or are filtered out by EphemeralDictionaries.
    StopWordLabelFilter
    Removes labels that start or end in a stop word.
